description.full: Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 2-4, HD (High Definition). Upgrade now to unlock the full-featured, multiplayer Domino Master game! Play against friends and family, or challenge the world on Xbox LIVE. The full version also includes achievements, leaderboards, and LiveVision support! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: Looking for a great game of Straight Dominos, All 3’s, All 5’s, Bergen, or Mexican Train? It’s all right here in Domino Master! Play solo or challenge family and friends. Work your way up the leaderboards, add to your achievements, check out all the difficulty levels and domino sets… even set your own custom rules!
